column1: * 1925 – J.R.R. Tolkien submits his resignation from Leeds University
column2: his employment will officially end on 31 December 1925.

column1: * 1926 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Willard G. Harding (21 October 1926).
* 1929 – Author Ursula K. Le Guin born.
* 1955 – J.R.R. Tolkien presents his paper English and Welsh.
* 1963 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mrs Munby.
* 2004 – The The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition) of The Lord of the Rings is published.

column2: featuring J.R.R. Tolkien as a fictional character
it is confirmed that Martin Freeman will play Bilbo Baggins in The Hobbit (film series).

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
